description:
This solid, heat-treated tool is designed to help you remove 4-notch BMX and single speed freewheel from hubs with 1.37 x 24 TPI threads.

  • 4 notches, 32mm apart, inside to inside and 40mm across, outside to outside
  • Fits over axles up to 16mm in diameter
name: Park Tool FR-6 Freewheel Remover
